Message: Hi, I’m the NewsBreak Ad Assistant. How can I help?
The user completes the submission of the form
I have had ads rejected for violation of advertising policy but do not appear as prohibited products in the list

I'm sorry to hear that your ads were rejected. There could be various reasons for this, such as issues with conversion tracking or typographical errors. I recommend reviewing our advertising policy to ensure your ad content aligns with NewsBreak’s requirements. You can find more details in our Ad Policy article here: [Ad Policy](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/25362604231053-Ad-Policy). If you have any specific questions about the rejection, feel free to ask!
Is it possible to have a real person review this?

While I can't transfer you to a live agent, you can appeal the ad rejection decision by emailing our support team at adsupport@newsbreak.com. They will review your case and provide further assistance. Let me know if there's anything else I can help with!
